sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col } from 'react-grid-system' import Header from './layout/Header' import VerticallyCenteredModal from './layout/VerticallyCenteredModal' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' export const IMG_BASE_URL = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/" export const LOCAL_STORAGE_KEY = 'movieApp.movies'; const MovieDetails = () => { const location = useLocation() const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); return (

{location.state.original_title}

({location.state.release_date.slice(0, 4)})
  • {location.state.vote_average}
  • / {location.state.vote_count} votes

  • Popularity: {Math.round(location.state.popularity)}

Language:

{location.state.original_language}

Release date:

{location.state.release_date}

Description:

{location.state.overview}
setModalShow(false)} />
) } export default MovieDetails
